description:
### Chat for distributed teams.

Zulip combines the immediacy of real-time chat with an email threading model.
With Zulip, you can catch up on important conversations while ignoring irrelevant ones.

### Notes
The msi installer of Zulip-Web was stopped being provided starting with version 5.8.0.
Versions prior to 5.7.0 will not get uninstalled automatically by this package, due to problems with above. Please remove Zulip manually before installing this package.
author: steviecoaster
